name: AsteroidBelt
description:
You are a spaceship pilot, a bad one and were only good enough to navigate straight into an asteroid belt.

...no, not some cool spaceship pilot with weapons, no hero, nothing, only a mediocre average pilot.

your only option is to dodge these damn rocks, good luck!

  • 2-Button Controls
  • Endless-Mode to play...well endless swarm of asteroids coming for you
  • Normal-Mode, one asteroid and you are gone

Entry for Godot GameJam Dec 2016 / Jan 2017.

Want to take part too?
https://godotengine.org/article/godot-gamejam-dec-...
